page.title: 06DISTINGTONS NAME+THE CHURCH
page.content: {HOW DISTINGTON GOT ITS NAME } Distington could have been named from a variety of sources.Saxon ton and ing,a personal name Dysten,Diss the Celtic God of death and the underworld.The most likely of these being the latter because of the findings of the 19th century excavations of the stone circle at Gilgarran. {DISTINGTON CHURCH } The old church was built in 1330.The new church was built in 1886 and cost Â£6000 to build.On average there are 25 christenings and 10 marriages per year.There are also a number of church activities such a Cubs,Scouts, Brownies,Guides,Mothers Union,Young Wives,Toddlers Group,Play Group and the church choir.Mr Woolcock the vicar was very helpful.
